subject: Missing Items
description_text:
Hello,

I recently ordered a set of Pro X pedals with haptic reactors. They have arrived but there are no reactors or brackets in the box. Please can you send some out as soon as possible.

Order #SSN4053

Regards,
Dan

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Dan Brown,  SF3295229772818 It has been sent. This is the tracking number. Please check.
